oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Detail from "The Essence of Mertie"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buckman Hall; Sculpture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One of CBU's major donors and Memphis philanthropist, Mertie Buckman was memorialized in Jill Burkee's sculpture, "The Essence of Mertie." Christian Brothers University commissioned the work for display in Buckman Hall
